::Spears::

"AAHHH!" as she is hit in the chest.  She falls back, laying inches 
from her staff.  She layes there gasping for breath as the last hit 
winded her.  


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, KSLawdogg@c... wrote:
> Serpentor:
> 
> 
> Serpentor saw Spears reach for her staff after she had been forced 
to drop it 
> from his shots.
> 
> "Oh, no you don't!" he yelled, firing off a plasma bolt at her, 
hoping to 
> stop her long enough for him to run.
